main event: A civilian reported observing a red and yellow flickering object in Spencer, Indiana for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed flickering in red and yellow colors., The sighting was lost due to haze affecting visibility., The observer reported multiple sightings to local authorities but no action was taken., The object was reported to have a downward course and appeared disc-shaped., There were prior sightings by the same observer near Spencer Indiana.
sighted object: a red and yellow flickering object
